text: Emil Karewicz (13 March 1923 – 18 March 2020) was a Polish actor. He was born in Wilno, Poland. His career lasted from 1948 until his retirement in 2015.Biography at the filmpolski.pl (in Polish). Retrieved December 5, 2014. He was best known for his role as SS-Sturmbannführer Hermann Brunner in TV Series Stawka większa niż życie.Stawka większa niż życie at the IMDb. Retrieved December 6, 2014. Karewicz also starred as SS-Obersturmführer in the movies How I Unleashed World War II and King Władysław II Jagiełło in Knights of the Teutonic Order. Karewicz died on 18 March 2020 at the age of 97.Emil Karewicz nie żyje. title: Emil Karewicz
